type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike
[i]Unmask[/i] – Whenever Lucina, Unmasked Hero or another creature you control is turned face up, draw a card. Then you may cloak a card from your hand. [i](To cloak a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
Disguise {U}{B} [i](You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)[/i]
